title: Amy Adams exudes bohemian vibes in a floral dress while shopping for Halloween costumes in LA
text:
She broke into the acting world working alongside Denise Richards in the cult classic film Drop Dead Gorgeous.

And Amy Adams looked every inch the Hollywood starlet wearing a billowing floral and lace dress in Los Angeles on Monday afternoon.

The 45-year-old actress sported a pair of black Birkenstocks with her bohemian threads as she picked up Halloween costumes with her family.

Looking good: Amy Adams looked every inch the Hollywood starlet wearing a billowing floral and lace dress in Los Angeles on Monday afternoon

Amy's sweeping gown was covered in pink and purple flowers with a eyelet detailing around her neck.

Long sleeves covered her arms and a hem just above her ankles revealed a pair of black leather sandals.

She tied her bright red hair back into a tight bun and appeared to be relatively makeup-free underneath a pair of tinted sunglasses.

Spooky season: The 45-year-old actress sported a pair of black Birkenstocks with her bohemian threads as she picked up Halloween costumes with her family

Her nine-year-old daughter Aviana wore a bright blue shirt with black leggings and combat boots.

The blonde little girl seemed excited for at least one of her Halloween costumes as she carried out a skull-shaped walking stick.

Husband Darren Le Gallo wore a Nine Inch Nails T-shirt and jeans while carrying out the hefty load of supplies.

While Amy has six Academy Award nominations under her belt, she was recently nominated for her first Emmy.

Lucky in love: She met her husband Darren Le Gallo at an acting class in 2001, and the couple were recently married

Adams portrays a woman named Camille Parker in the HBO drama series Sharp Objects, based on the novel of the same name by Gillian Flynn.

The series follows a journalist who returns to her hometown to investigate the murder of a teenage girl.

She met her husband Darren Le Gallo at an acting class in 2001, and the couple were recently married.
